scripts.deploy: npm run build-storybook && cd storybook-static && vercel --name react-hook-form-material-ui --prod
scripts.build: cd packages/rhf-mui && tsup packages/rhf-mui/src/index.ts --clean --format esm,cjs --dts --external react --inject packages/rhf-mui/react-shim.js --legacy-output --minify --sourcemap
scripts.release-minor: cd packages/rhf-mui && npm run build && npm run check-types && release minor
scripts.release-patch: cd packages/rhf-mui && npm run build && npm run check-types && release patch
scripts.release-major: cd packages/rhf-mui && npm run build && npm run check-types && release major
